features: Spring-Locked Dashboard Dock Car Mount has a Non-slip Sticky 3M Tape, will holds your device firmly and securely in place even in the bumpiest conditions. ▶ Much steadier than GPS portable friction beanbag dashboard mount and suction cup holder. ▶ Three slots design allows angles adjustment. ▶ Clamshell dock mount is also great for holding phone as well as small items like parking cards, keys, passport or wallet, BFF for the sports-loving drivers if they are changing into their gym clothes.

Original texture design perfectly matches and blends well with any car's interior. ▶ An alternative to windshield and vent mounts, keeps your windshield clean, no interference with your air condition.▶ Easy to use, no mounting bracket needed, no magnets needed, no tools needed, directly adhere it to dashboard of cars with the 3M tape firmly. ▶ Sunshine-resistance shell cover will prevent device from getting overheat and keep the screen can be saw clearly without reflect light.
Universal GPS Holder for Car, compatible with 3.5-6 inch handheld GPS, such as TomTom GO Start VIA, Magellan Roadmate, Rand Mcnally, Navman Sat Nav Portable GPS Navigator.

Also allow hands-free use of cell phone without or with Phone Grips/Phone Ring Holder/Magsafe Case/Leather Case/Heavy Duty Case/Clear Case/Battery Case in the car. ▶ Works perfectly for most cell phones, even large phone with heavy case: Compatible with iPhone 15 Pro Max, 15 Pro, 15 Plus, 15, iPhone 14 Pro Max, 14 Pro, 14 Plus, 14, 13 Pro Max, 13 Pro, 13 Mini, 13, 12 Pro Max, 12 Pro, 12 Mini, 12, 11 Pro Max, 11 Pro, 11, XS Max, XS, XR, X, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7, SE, and more.

Dashboard phone holder for 4-7.2 inch android cell phones, for Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra, S23+ S23 S22 Ultra, S22+ S22 S21+ S21Ultra S21 S20 S20Ultra S20+ S10 S10+ S10e S9 S9+ S8 S8+ S7 S7Edge S6 S6Edge S6Edge A91 A90 A80 A72 A71 A70 A70s A60 A53 A52S A52 A51 A50 A50s A42 A41 A40 A40s A33 A32 A31 A30 A30s A23 A22s A22 A21 A21s A20 A20e A20s A13 A12 A11 A10 A10e A10s A03 A03s A02s A02 A01 F62 F52 F42 F41 F23 F22 F12 F02S Note 20 10 10+ 9 8 6 / Google Pixel 7Pro 7 6Pro 6 5 5a 4a 4XL 4, etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The GPS holder stuck nicely to the dash and the GPS is easier to access than when on the windshield. Looks good without the GPS also. It also does a good job of holding the GPS in place. Happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome dash mount. It holds several sizes of phones or gps. If you use the extra sticky pad they suggest, it really sticks. For some reason, i thought it swivels, but it doesn’t, so make sure you have it in the position you want before you stick it down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works so far, but limited angles, and questionable adhesion
reviews.reviewText: Even though I’ve rated this three stars in the initial three rating areas, my overall rating is four stars. Here’s why.I’ve been using a fairly old Garmin Nuvi six inch navigation device in my summer cars for several years, because they were not equipped with factory navigation. The Garmin beanbag base worked fairly well, except on this Chrysler Crossfire, which has a very firm suspension and is the type of car that begs to be driven hard. I’ve put about a couple of hundred miles on the car since installing this base. The dashboard on this car is as slippery as ice; it’s amazing how slippery it is. The beanbag base would slide off, hard, every time I turned or accelerated a tiny bit too fast. So it was useless on this car.The base under review is, so far, keeping the Garmin in place. However....I have not made any sudden turns, stops, or jack rabbit type starts. I’ve been driving fairly conservatively, but there are a lot of rough roads around here, and driving usually includes a great deal of stop and go streets.I’m almost certain the first time I decide to floor the gas pedal from a stop, the base and Garmin will fly off the dash. It’s quite wobbly. There are very angles available, none of which are completely satisfactory. But I can live with the most perpendicular to the dash angle.So, I’ve overall rated this base four stars, because it seemed like the best available option I could find. I refuse to stick anything to my windshield, mainly because the windshield is already quite small. I fully expect to have to resort to some other type of adhesive for this base, probably sooner rather than later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting and solid
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this attached to my dash since February 2020! It’s now February 2024. It’s still solidly stuck to the dash! No need to worry about adhesive! I live in an area with both extreme cold and high humidity and heat. It has lasted in all temperatures.without any issues. Very solid product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So useful - use it all the time!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased it for my Garmin - but works extremely well with my phone as well! Now I use my phone for trip directions all the time - so easy to place my phone & take it out - adjust the angle - and close when not in use. I love it! I have never attempted to remove it from the top of the dash - and probably never will!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far it’s staying on dash. Been a month. Holds my iPhone or my gps perfectly. Stay’s definitely put. When it’s in the holder it’s extremely secure. Love that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered 2 of these, one stuck to the car wonderfully and very solid, the other seems less the sticky and will not stick on my truck. the one that works, works great and I love it! just wish was more reliable product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great in my Frontier pick-up
reviews.reviewText: I can't comment on its adhesive/stick performance, since my Frontier has a built in tray on the dash that this thing sits in very nicely, with almost no room to slide around. It holds my GPS securely and I like the portability. Obviously less bulky and sleeker than the "bean-bag" pedestal-type holders used in our other 2 vehicles, and a lot cheaper, too.

I misplaced my windshield suction holder that came with the Garmin GPS a long time ago. 1. it was a pain to even try to reach it because it was so far up the dash and 2. it was too hard to try and lay the GPS down or hold it so you could use it to navigate. This new clam shell style holder is just great! It is solid. It holds the GPS firmly while allowing full access to the touch screen. And you can stick it where you want, up close so you can see it and use the touch screen as much as you need to. And you can position it so your copilot can interact with it too. I don't know why it took me so long to research and see that this thing was available. Awesome holder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Stuck ok let’s hope it last to Portugal and back to Cheshire
Arrived early and did the job
I used Velcro to adhere the base to the dash carpet. No more suction caps falling off the windshield
